pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers

Class RewardViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.RewardViewController

  • public class RewardViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the "reward tab" that has:

    a table view rewardTV, that displays the rewards that the logged parent, returned by the method:

    PersonDAO.getLoggedParent()

    a "plus button" that opens the "add reward window", managed by:

    pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.AddRewardController.java

    a "notifications button" that opens the "notifications window" managed by:

    pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.NotificationsController.java

    buttons to the other tabs: parents, tasks and kids:

    pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.ParentViewController.java

    pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.TaskViewController.java

    pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.KidViewController.java

    The "reward tab" is in this fxml file: pt.iade.ManageeMHome.views#rewardView.fxml.

    Author:
    jaime
